- We save your images in this App, but will not take any of your personal info or share anything that belongs to you. 
 - If your album has less than 2 image, it will not be reproduced. 
 -You can make a single image your Wallpaper by going to the single image. 
 - To open an album, click in the name, if you want to delete or remane an album, hold the album's name.
